Know me more

Who I Am

A software developer with a degree in Computer Science and Engineering from APJAK University, Kerala, India. A technology enthusiast and a programmer with experience in coding in various popular languages with Python being my go-to. A very curious individual by nature and enjoys learning new things across various fields of life.

What I'm Good At

Data Structures and Algorithms, Web Development, API building, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Web Scraping, .NET Development.

Languages and frameworks I'm Skilled in

Python, Flask, C#, Docker, Javascript, Git, BeautifulSoup4, Java, HTML/CSS, WPF.
